name: Space Defence DX
description:
Game Description

Building upon the critically acclaimed game Space Defence, Space Defence DX brings a new interface, adds effects, cleans-up and slightly balances, to become the ultimate planetary-defence experience.

Features:
  • Shoot asteroids and aliens to protect the Earth.
  • Build turrets to aid you as in a tower defence game.
  • Building upon the original Space Defence.
Credits

Space Defence DX was made by:

  • Juan C. Osorio A.

Music: "Space Reggae" by Tango Star under CC BY-SA 3.0 License https://tangostar.newgrounds.com/

Sound Effects by Dklon under CC BY 3.0 License https://opengameart.org/users/dklon

The Original Space Defence was made by:

  • Artem Gulyaev
  • Geumseong Han
  • Lenny Steve Jox
University of Applied Sciences Europe

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
